Package com.dalsemi.onewire.adapter

Interface Summary
NetAdapterConstants Interface for holding all constants related to Network Adapter communications.
 

Class Summary
DSPortAdapter The abstract base class for all 1-Wire port adapter objects.
MulticastListener Generic Mulitcast broadcast listener.
NetAdapter NetAdapter is a network-based DSPortAdapter.
NetAdapterConstants.Connection An inner utility class for coupling Socket with I/O streams
NetAdapterHost NetAdapterHost is the host (or server) component for a network-based DSPortAdapter.
SerialService The SerialService class provides serial IO services to the USerialAdapter class.
 

Exception Summary
OneWireIOException This exception is thrown when there is an IO error communicating on on the 1-Wire Network.
